DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to devise the method to reduce laryngeal injuries during double-lumen tube intubation.
DOC.brief_title: Double-lumen Tube Intubation Technique to Reduce Laryngeal Injuries
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing thoracic surgery that require the placement of leftsided doublelumen tubes Preoperative hoarseness or sore throat History of upper airway diseases Anticipated difficult airway Operation time longer than 6 hours
